entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.0.6
entry.content:
• No notable changes in this release

What's Changed

  • Bind to all network interfaces (was: only localhost) by @wsw70 in https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/pull/708
  • feat: add deadline management features to TODO items, including expiration handling and quick selection options for setting deadlines
  • fix: update PluginInfo schema to make author, url, minAppVersion, displayName, description, readme, downloads optional; improve PluginCard styling and clean up whitespace in plugin router
  • feat: enhance OAuth callback handling by adding return button on error, update public routes, and improve user navigation flow

New Contributors

  • @wsw70 made their first contribution in https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/pull/708

Full Changelog: https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/compare/1.0.5...1.0.6
